Class.ClassComment:
DistributedTaskExecutionPolicy /** * DistributedTaskExecutionPolicy allows task to specify its custom task execution policy across Infinispan cluster.

DistributedTaskExecutionPolicy effectively scopes execution of tasks to a subset of nodes. For example, someone might want to exclusively execute tasks on a local network site instead of a backup remote network centre as well. Others might, for example, use only a dedicated subset of a certain Infinispan rack nodes for specific task execution. DistributedTaskExecutionPolicy is set per instance of DistributedTask. * @author Vladimir Blagojevic * @since 5.2 */
